info.game_comments:
Tom Kunzen game 2.
Single-player Final Jeopardy!

(2, 1).clue: Hume Cronyn is one of the 2 Supreme Court justices murdered at the beginning of this Julia Roberts film

(3, 1).clue: "No man, not even a doctor, ever gives any... definition of what a nurse should be other than... devoted and obedient"
